game.name: Cyberdelia: Micro
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cyberdelia: Micro is a psychedelic, retro-inspired JRPG where drugs are your best friend. You play as Xaxis, a cyberdelic robot sent to a spiritual land to prevent the end of the world.
